member.name: TF_DA_COLORTYPE
member.summary: Elements of the TF_DA_COLORTYPE enumeration specify the format of the color contained in the structure.

member.name: TF_DA_COLORTYPE.TF_CT_NONE
member.summary: The structure contains no color data.

member.name: TF_DA_COLORTYPE.TF_CT_SYSCOLOR
member.summary: The color is specified as a system color index. For more information about the system color indexes, see .

member.name: TF_DA_COLORTYPE.TF_CT_COLORREF
member.summary: The color is specified as an RGB value.
